sentences.sContent: Transitions within states should normally be synchronous, since there is no change of owner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Transitions within states should normally be synchronous, since there is no change of owner.
sentences.sCn: 状态间的转换通常应该是同步的，因为所有者没有改变。

sentences.sContent: For example, you might have a synchronous replica on another machine in the same data center, and an asynchronous replica on a machine in another data center.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example, you might have a synchronous replica on another machine in the same data center, and an asynchronous replica on a machine in another data center.
sentences.sCn: 例如，您可以在同一个数据中心的另一台机器上选择同步复制，而在另一个数据中心的机器上选择异步复制。

phrases.pCn: 同步运行；同步操作；同步作业

words.tran: [核] 同步加速器；同步回旋加速器
同时发生，同步性；对照性历史年谱
[电] 同步装置；同步闪光装置
同步指示器；同步示波器；同期表；同步表
同步检定器；[电子] 同步示波器
使协调（synchronize的过去分词）；同时发生；校准
使同时（synchronise的过去式和过去分词）
使同步；使同时发生（等于synchronize）

trans.tranOther: if two or more things are synchronous, they happen at the same time or work at the same speed
